thread.section_title: Marley Spoon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marley Spoon | marleyspoon.com.au
thread.title: Hana Zarazel
thread.title_full: Marley Spoon reviewed by Hana Zarazel

author: Hana Zarazel
title: Hana Zarazel
text: I've ordered 3 times as I was hopeful that the service would get better. It got worse. Firstly, they dumped my order outside a busy city apartment block and didn't tell me over a Saturday night. I inquired about this and they ignored my email. The portion sizes are tiny. I found myself having to cook up extra things even though I was cooking for 2. The products are not fresh as they would go off about 2 days later. They give you tiny portions of meat. It's not worth the money- I can google recipes that are better for less money. Really disappointed as I was excited to try this! Cool idea- poor service.
